name: Israeli Ministry of Health nurse advanced course
description: Identifies RN advanced course according to Israeli MoH
usage: SHOULD include the advanced-course-code, a dash (-) and permanent-registration-certificate-number (nurse license-number as the moh-nurse-registration-certificate identifier) - where advanced-course-code is a value from PractitionerAdvancedCourseMoH. It means the identifier for different advanced course certificates for the same nurse will not be unique, but the practice-code will show the difference between them.
